mapper.update:
update rc_file_info
ORIGINAL_NAME = #{originalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUFFIX_NAME = #{suffixName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIZE = #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RELATIVE_PATH = #{relativePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where FILE_INFO_ID = #{fileInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select FILE_INFO_ID, ORIGINAL_NAME, REAL_NAME, SUFFIX_NAME, SIZE, RELATIVE_PATH, CREATE_TIME, MEMBER_ID from rc_file_info where FILE_INFO_ID = #{fileInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
